Nic>> Can you split large files across a namespace?
Nic>> After all, that is what content-range is doing. Making a 
Nic>> resource, which we normally consider atomically, 
Nic>> addressable at a lower level. But another way is to 
Nic>> make a video (or a VM fs) accessible over the uri 
Nic>> namespace.

For example?  (Just curious)

-Mike Schinkel 
http://www.mikeschinkel.com/blogs/ 
http://www.welldesignedurls.org/
